p.d:
+ An interface for maintaining credential caches (KRB5CCache), that can be used for authenticating against a kerberos5 realm + Bindings for nearly the complete GSSAPI (RFC2744) + The administrative interface (KADM5) + Support for HTTP Negotiate authentication via GSSAPI
Documentation: + see docs/ for the API documentation + there are several pieces of example code in the examples/ directory + see below for install instructions
